title: Innovative COO of Tennessee: An Interview with Greg Adams
itunes:title: Innovative COO of Tennessee: Interview with Greg Adams
description: Meet Greg Adams, the new chairman of the Wheaton Center for Faith, Politics and Economics Board, and hear how he took his 37 years at IBM and used it to serve as the COO of Tennessee.  Learn from his faith journey and how it impacted his work in both the business world and government service.
content:encoded: Meet Greg Adams, the new chairman of the Wheaton Center for Faith, Politics and Economics Board, and hear how he took his 37 years at IBM and used it to serve as the COO of Tennessee.  Learn from his faith journey and how it impacted his work in both the business world and government service.
itunes:subtitle: Interview with Greg Adams
itunes:author: Wheaton College
